summary: Newcastle is a city in northeast England, located on the River Tyne. It is the biggest city in the region and has a long history. Originally a Roman settlement, it was named after a castle built in the 11th century. During the Industrial Revolution, Newcastle was a major shipbuilding center. It was once part of Northumberland but is now a metropolitan borough of Tyne and Wear. The city is governed by Newcastle City Council.
title: Newcastle upon Tyne
